name: Crowd Outta Control
description:
Crowd outta Control

You become a frantic crowd that quickly spirals out of control. Buying food at a supermarket may seem simple at first, but soon you are scrambling over yourself, just trying to avoid being crushed by the growing crowd. Can you survive the chaos?

Gameplay:
You begin alone and simply need to collect all the items and reach the exit before the timer runs out. However, the next thing you know, you have to repeat this task, only accompanied by a character that seems mysteriously like your former self. Watch out that you don’t get crushed by this doppelgänger, who is now out of your control. As the rounds progress, you build up into a menacing, chaotic crowd, who seem bent on destroying you before you can complete your objective.

Controls:
Use the arrow keys or WASD. Press R to fully restart a level.

Credits:
Jump sound from freesfx.co.uk
